steps.conclusion: The output violates the rule for language exams: it must be EXACTLY ONE suggestion with the exam name as the title. The title is "Preparação para o TOEFL" instead of simply "TOEFL". The english_title is "TOEFL Test Preparation" instead of the exam name "TOEFL". This also conflicts with the expectation to avoid prep-style titles like "Preparatório para o TOEFL", which "Preparação para o TOEFL" effectively is.
None beyond the major issue. The output is in Portuguese, includes exactly one suggestion, has is_language_course=true, the icon starts with tabler-, the title is under 5 words, and contains TOEFL.

- Change the title to "TOEFL" to match the exam name requirement.
- Set english_title to "TOEFL".
- Keep is_language_course=true and the icon prefix.
- Maintain a concise one-sentence description in Portuguese.
